summary: mighty quidditch
title: mighty quidditch
body:
Gryffindor: "We're so good at quidditch! Get sucked in Slytherin."
Slytherin: "But we won for the last seven years before that potter boy came along, you're only winning because of him!"
Gryffindor: "Well, that's not the only reason. Our house supports each other physically and emotionally, and we've got good players apart from Harry!
Slytherin: "Yeah, whatever."

dialogue.name: Gryffindor
dialogue.label: Gryffindor:
dialogue.phrase: "We're so good at quidditch! Get sucked in Slytherin."

dialogue.name: Slytherin
dialogue.label: Slytherin:
dialogue.phrase: "But we won for the last seven years before that potter boy came along, you're only winning because of him!"

dialogue.name: Gryffindor
dialogue.label: Gryffindor:
dialogue.phrase: "Well, that's not the only reason. Our house supports each other physically and emotionally, and we've got good players apart from Harry!

blog.name: benjaminclareyrobar
blog.title: Benjamin Clarey-Robar
blog.description:
I'm an overly anxious writer.
I write fanfiction.
I have an inconsistent writing and art style. The equality of my work seriously depends on the amount of sleep I've gotton and I hardly ever sleep. You will be able to tell when I've slept and when I haven't.
Check out my Sanders Sides Harry Potter AU.

summary: Patton’s Backstory + Moxiety Friendship, Part Two
body:
Patton’s Backstory + Moxiety Friendship, Part Two

  • Since their brief chat, Patton greeted Virgil with a ‘Hey, Kiddo!’ every time they crossed paths.
  • A few weeks after this new rhythm started, Patton threw it off again. 
  • Virgil was waiting for his mother to pick him up from outside the public school he attended.
  • The only reason Virgil’s wizard parents sent him to a muggle school is because his Dad’s father, a muggle, insisted Virgil attended one and his parents figure it wouldn’t hurt.
  • Patton was running by when he caught sight of Virgil.
  • Virgil saw him too and was prepared for Patton to call out to him.
  • He was surprised when Patton ran over to him and plopped down in the grass beside him.
  • Patton started a completely one sided conversation.
  • This when Virgil realized Patton was easily excitable and when he got excited, he got loud. 
  • A small part of Virgil wanted to move away from Patton.
  • He was loud, somewhat annoying and exhausting for the the antisocial boy to keep up with.
  • But mostly, he was drawn to Patton.
  • The blond had a bright, captivating charm that impossible to escape once he infected you with it.
  • Virgil didn’t have any friends. Or siblings.
  • All the kids in the neighborhood thought he was weird because strange things happened around him without a logical explanation.
  • The next day, same time, Patton showed up while Virgil was waiting for his mom and repeated yesterdays actions.
  • He continued to do this everyday until the weekend and Virgil found himself sort of looking forward to it.
  • Mrs. O’Mara, Virgil’s mother, was happy to see her son making a friend.
  • One day, after school, while picking her son up, Mrs. O’Mara asked if Patton wanted to come over and play with Virgil. 
  • At the time Virgil was humiliated but later would be grateful she invited him over.
  • At much later date, Virgil would also wonder if anyone ever taught Patton about Stranger Danger because Patton went so willingly with his mother when he barely knew her.
  • The entire walk home Virgil was mentally freaking out.
  • ‘What if he didn’t like Vigil?’
  • Even at a young age, prior to being diagnosed with anxiety, Even Virgil himself knew he was prone to anxious thoughts, worrying and just being an overall downer.
  • Virgil’s stomach was turning with nerves when Patton grabbed his elbow to get Virgil’s attention.
  • “Don’t touch me!” Virgil snapped before Patton could say whatever it was that he got Virgil’s attention for.
  • Before Virgil could berate himself mentally for snapping at the other kid, Patton shrugged, “Okay,” he said.
  • Virgil didn’t live far from the school so they at his house quickly.
  •  Mrs. O’Marra ushered them inside.
  • It was love at first sight for Patton and Cheshire, Virgil’s cat.
  • This surprised the O’Maras as Cheshire hates everyone including Virgil.
  • Virgil’s house a mix of magical and muggle.
  • After Mrs. O’Mara stopped fussing about Virgil ‘making new friends’, they went up to Virgil’s room.
  • There really isn’t much to do in his room.
  • Virgil want to ask if the other boy if he wanted to go to park but he recalled Patton’s words:
  • “Nah, I’m never going there again.”
  • He didn’t ask but he was quite long enough the concern Patton.
  • “Kiddo?” 
  • Breaking after from his thoughts, Virgil said the first thing he could think of; “Why do you not want to go to the park anymore?”
  • Patton looked surprised.
  • “I mean, you went so often, why stop?” Virgil said when Patton didn’t say anything.
  • “Because I can finally go to other places.” Patton said vaguely.
  • At Virgil confused look, Patton sighed and sat on the edge of Virgil’s bed.
  • His blue eyes held something in them that made Patton appear a lot older then nine.
  • “I mean, I had to stay close to the hospital in case something happened. It’s the only one near the hospital.’
  • “It’s because I have Atrapado Adentro Magicae, or AAM,” Patton carried on, “It’s mean I’ve internalized my magical outbursts. My magic attacks my own body but I’m in the this clinical trial and everything is going really great. The Healer said I’ll probably be well enough to go to Hogwarts.”
  • Patton didn’t mention that AAM usual kills witches and wizards.
  • “I met Thomas there.” He said as an after thought.
  • Virgil seen how Patton seemed to lighten up at the mere thought of Thomas.
  • “Who’s Thomas?”
  • “Thomas is my dad. Sort of, he’s technically my foster dad.”
  • Thomas Sanders had been fostering Patton since he was six. 
  • Thomas is a half-blood wizard.
  • Thomas was volunteering in the free clinic at hospital where Patton was as research for a role.
  • When he asked about the bubbly boy, he learn that Patton’s father died when he was infant and his mother left him when he got sick.
  • She said she lost her husband, she couldn’t handle loosing her son too. That she couldn’t handle a terminally ill child.
  • Thomas decided Patton need someone to look at for him and went through the process.
  • Patton was the one who later asked Thomas not to contact his mother when he was longer “Terminally” ill.
  • Virgil had two questions: Why go outside at nighttime? Why are you telling me this?
  • The answer to the first question is because Patton meet a boy his age at the Hospital (In the muggle part of the hospital.) when he was younger and the boy nearly died from Meningitis. 
  • He boy talked about stars not-stop. Patton hardly understood what he was saying but didn’t tell him.
  • He said of his senses, he was glad he didn’t loose his sight.
  • Patton learnt to love the stars too.
  • Virgil found himself grateful for the chance met Patton.
  • “I’m not complaining but, why did you tell me all that?” he asked verbally.
  • Virgil would never share so much personal information with someone he barely knew.
  • “Because, we’re friends.” Patton said simply.
  • Virgil smiled shyly, “Yeah, we are.”
  • “Should I tell you my name now?”
  • “Oh, I don’t know your name! Do you know mine? It’s Patton Foster.”
  • “I’m Virgil.”

  • He said of his senses, he was glad he didn’t loose his sight.
  • Patton learnt to love the stars too.
  • Virgil found himself grateful for the chance met Patton.
  • “I’m not complaining but, why did you tell me all that?” he asked verbally.
  • Virgil would never share so much personal information with someone he barely knew.
  • “Because, we’re friends.” Patton said simply.
  • Virgil smiled shyly, “Yeah, we are.”
  • “Should I tell you my name now?”
  • “Oh, I don’t know your name! Do you know mine? It’s Patton Foster.”
  • “I’m Virgil.”

summary: Imagine dating Ron Wealsey:
title: Imagine dating Ron Wealsey:
body:
Dating Ron Wealsey would be like:
- End up burning the kitchen down with his horrible cooking skills.
- Lots of pranks, and I mean multiple of them, like his twin brothers.
- Making you put 5 bottles of sunscreen on him when going to the beach so he doesn't get burnt. 
 But most importantly:
- He would treat you like his queen, always putting you first, making sure your not in trouble, giving quick glances at you while in class, and him smiling brightly with his white teeth when you look at him.

dialogue.name: Dating Ron Wealsey would be like
dialogue.label: Dating Ron Wealsey would be like:

dialogue.phrase: - End up burning the kitchen down with his horrible cooking skills.
- Lots of pranks, and I mean multiple of them, like his twin brothers.
- Making you put 5 bottles of sunscreen on him when going to the beach so he doesn't get burnt.

- He would treat you like his queen, always putting you first, making sure your not in trouble, giving quick glances at you while in class, and him smiling brightly with his white teeth when you look at him.

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in squib births, the wizarding world is tossed into chaos concerning the loss of magical heritage. The renegades vow to protect what’s left of magical blood without caring about the damage along the way. More and more wixen go missing, including the Weasleys’ own Dominique. The Ministry fights within itself as Percy Weasley and Hermione Granger battle for the position of Minister of Magic, tearing the fabric holding wizarding society together.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

Our roleplay currently has many canon characters available, such as Victoire Weasley, Freddie Weasley, Louis Weasley, Scorpius Malfoy, and both Scamander twins. We also welcome original characters, with lots of surnames available from canon!

summary: Just for kicks:
body:
Just for kicks:

Team I Don’t Have A Dad:

Sabrina Spellman, Daenerys Stormborn, the Stark kids, Peter Parker, Tony Stark, Jon Snow, Harry Potter.

Team I Had A Dad, He Was a Dick:

Daenerys Stormborn, Jon Snow, Tyrion Lannister, Gamora, Nebula, Magnus Bane, Yara Greyjoy, Tom Riddle.

Team I Don’t Have A Family:

Daenerys Stormborn, Gamora, Peter Parker, Tony Stark, Yara Greyjoy, Nagini, Credence Barebone.

Team My Children Are Dead:

DAENERYS STORMBORN, Catelyn Stark, Cersei Lannister, Olenna Tyrell, Lyanna’s parents.

Team I Died For My Love/Family:

Missandei, Rhaegal, Viserion, everyone in Infinity War, Theon Greyjoy, Lyanna Mormont, Jorah Mormont, Jeor Mormont, Bill Potts

Team Not Straight:

Lilith/Madam Satan, Zelda Spellman, Daenerys Stormborn, Yara Greyjoy, every Dornish, Missy, Bill Potts

Team I Killed Myself And Laughed Like It Was The Greatest Joke:

The Master/Missy.

blog.name: expelliarmus-potter
blog.title: Harry "Expelliarmus" Potter

summary:
Jacob: Why do the British refer to people by their last names?
Newt: Because it gives us great pleasure to see a face and...
body:
Jacob: Why do the British refer to people by their last names?

Newt: Because it gives us great pleasure to see a face and associate it with a sense of inhumanity. It’s why we have so many mortal enemies at all times.
